name: The Last Sunshine [alpha]
description:
Please note that this is a public ALPHA TEST for The Last Sunshine. As such, many features will be incomplete or missing and you will likely find bugs. Having said that, we welcome you to play along and give us feedback!

The Last Sunshine is a fast paced top down shooter inspired action game. Earn a variety of skills, then mix and match them with your customized stats to dispatch droves of dark aggressive enemies. Will light win against the darkness? It's the end of the universe!

  • Incredible boss fights
  • Expansive passive tree
  • Lots of skills to collect
  • Random generated levels
  • Unique and detailed 2D art style

Fans of twin-stick shooters and rogue-likes will both enjoy the frantic gameplay and ways to customize Sol in a harrowing journey to the end of all things. The Last Sunshine allows you to mix and match many different attack skills and craft your own play style with a rewarding passive tree to experiment with. Allocate points into the passive tree to improve your stats and define your play style. Speed or survivability, retaliatory or regeneration, choose wisely what compliments your style best.

Beware! This really is the end of the universe! The Last Sunshine ramps up in difficulty and you only start with one life!
